sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app>
    <v-card>
      <v-container>
        <v-row>
          <v-col cols="6" sm="6">
            <v-card max-width="500">
              <v-card-title>Customer</v-card-title>
              <v-form>
                <v-container>
                  <v-rows>
                    <v-col cols="8" sm="6">
                      <v-select label="Type"></v-select>
                    </v-col>
                    <v-col cols="8" sm="6">
                      <v-text-field label="Currency"></v-text-field>
                    </v-col>
                    <v-col cols="8" sm="8">
                      <v-text-field label="Customer Name"></v-text-field>
                    </v-col>
                    <v-col cols="8" sm="8">
                      <v-menu>
                        <template v-slot:activator="{ on, attrs }">
                          <v-text-field
                            v-model="date"
                            label="Order Date"
                            append-icon="mdi-calendar"
                            readonly
                            v-bind="attrs"
                            v-on="on"
                          ></v-text-field>
                        </template>
                        <v-date-picker v-model="date" landscape>
                          <v-spacer></v-spacer>
                          <v-btn text color="primary" @click="menu = false">
                            Cancel
                          </v-btn>
                          <v-btn
                            text
                            color="primary"
                            @click="$refs.menu.save(date)"
                          >
                            OK
                          </v-btn>
                        </v-date-picker>
                      </v-menu>
                    </v-col>
                  </v-rows>
                </v-container>
              </v-form>
            </v-card>
          </v-col>
          <v-col cols="6" sm="6">
            <v-card max-width="500 px">
              <v-card-title>Detail Order</v-card-title>
              <v-container>
                <v-rows>
                  <v-col>
                    <v-simple-table></v-simple-table>
                  </v-col>
                </v-rows>
              </v-container>
            </v-card>
          </v-col>
          <v-col cols="12">
            <v-card max-width="1000 px">
              <v-card-title class="justify-center">List Product</v-card-title>
              <v-container>
                <v-rows>
                  <v-col>
                    <v-data-table
                      :headers="headers"
                      :items="itemProduct"
                      :options.sync="optionsProduct"
                      :server-items-length="totalProduct"
                      @update:options="paginate"
                      show-select
                      item-key="id"
                      class="elevation-1"
                    >
                      <template v-slot:[`item.image`]="{ item }">
                        <v-img
                          class="pa-2 ma-2"
                          :src="item.image_url"
                          max-width="50"
                          max-height="50"
                        ></v-img>
                      </template>

                      <template v-slot:[`item.price_currency`]="{ item }"
                        >{{ item.price }} ({{ item.currency }})
                      </template>
                    </v-data-table>
                  </v-col>
                </v-rows>
              </v-container>
            </v-card>
          </v-col>
        </v-row>
      </v-container>
    </v-card>
  </v-app>
</template>


<script>
import Proxy from "@/services/proxy";
export default {
  name: "createOrder",
  data() {
    return {
      menu: false,
      date: "",
      headers: [
        {
          text: "Image",
          align: "start",
          sortable: false,
          value: "image",
        },
        { text: "Product Name", value: "product_name" },
        { text: "Price(Currency)", value: "price_currency" },
        { text: "Data Added", value: "created_at" },
      ],
      itemProduct: [],
      totalProduct: 0,
      optionsProduct: {},
    };
  },
  watch: {
    options: {
      handler() {
        this.readProductFromAPI();
      },
    },
    deep: true,
  },
  methods: {
    paginate() {
      this.readProductFromAPI();
    },
    readProductFromAPI() {
      const uri = "https://api-dev.phantasmode.com";
      const token = localStorage.getItem("access_token");
      const headers = {
        Authorization: "Bearer " + token,
        Accept: "application/json",
      };
      const { page, itemsPerPage, sortBy, sortDesc } = this.optionsProduct;
      if (sortBy.length === 1 && sortDesc.length === 1) {
        this.itemProduct = this.itemProduct.sort((a, b) => {
          const sortA = a[sortBy[0]];
          const sortB = b[sortBy[0]];

          if (sortDesc[0]) {
            if (sortA < sortB) return 1;
            if (sortA > sortB) return -1;
            return 0;
          } else {
            if (sortA < sortB) return -1;
            if (sortA > sortB) return 1;
            return 0;
          }
        });
      }
      console.log(sortBy, sortDesc);
      Proxy.get(
        uri +
          "/api/products" +
          "?page=" +
          page +
          "&limit=" +
          itemsPerPage +
          "&sortBy=" +
          (sortBy.length === 1 ? sortBy[0] : "created_at") +
          "&sortDirection=" +
          (sortDesc.length === 1 ? (sortDesc[0] ? "desc" : "asc") : "desc"),
        {
          headers,
        }
      )
        .then((res) => {
          this.totalProduct = res.data.total;
          this.itemProduct = res.data.data;
        })
        .catch((err) => {
          console.log(err);
        });
    },
  },
  mounted() {
    this.readProductFromAPI();
  },
};
</script>
